who am i?

about

I'm an interdisplinary digital artist working mainly with front-end web technologies, I specialize in React, Redux, Javascript, P5.js, HTML, and CSS / SASS; as well as having experience with backend technologies such as MongoDB, Mongoose and Socket.IO

I have experience working with both Functional Programming and Object Oriented Programming, and love to implement beautiful, mobile responsive designs and create interactive, animated digital experiences. I'm actively seeking work in the London area, so if you like my projects and want a developer with work ethic and passion, I'm your guy.

Let's work together.
